rows.label: qst101604_msg0001
rows.name: Tch... So I lost after all.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought we had gotten pretty
strong, but it seems you were
on another level...

rows.label: qst101604_msg0003
rows.name:
Take it. It's my grandfather's
treasure, and mine.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0005
rows.name:
I couldn't have collected the
remaining parts on my own.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0006
rows.name:
...Hm? Wait a minute. Let
me see all the parts.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0007
rows.name:
Combining three each seems to form
two parts, a circle and a square...

rows.label: qst101604_msg0009
rows.name:
'When the fragments of three
and three gather, the hero's
treasure shall be bestowed.'

rows.label: qst101604_msg0011
rows.name:
But it doesn't seem like this
itself is the treasure...

rows.label: qst101604_msg0012
rows.name:
Oh well. From here on,
it's your treasure hunt.

rows.label: qst101604_msg0013
rows.name:
Find the hero's treasure that the
ancient Nopon tribe left behind!

rows.label: qst101604_msg0014
rows.name:
Well then... I guess I'll go
look for some new treasure!
